credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: Study for "Muse of History"
medium: Black and white crayons on gray paper
description: A woman, lightly draped, faces the viewer while writing on a large tablet. Below: detail of one hand grasping the tablet. Signed and inscribed in pencil, lower right: "Study / for / Muse of U.S.A. / History / E. Vedder.."
name: Drawing
